result.arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱهۡتَدَوۡاْ زَادَهُمۡ هُدٗى وَءَاتَىٰهُمۡ تَقۡوَىٰهُمۡ
result.translation: Nayo abakurikiye uburongozi, Imana Allah Iraheza Ikabongerereza uburongozi ku bwo bari basanganwe, maze ukwemera kwabo kugakomera; Ikanaborohereza mu kubashoboza gushikira igamburukiramana ryiyongera ku ryo bari basanganwe.
